level.heading: Severability.
level.text: If any provision of this chapter or the application thereof to any person or circumstance is held invalid, the invalidity shall not affect other provisions or applications of the chapter which can be given effect without the invalid provision or application, and to this end the provisions of this chapter are severable.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 3-160
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 3-160, see Historical and Statutory Notes following ยง 41-101.

level.heading: Editor's Notes
level.text: Uniform Law: This section is based upon ยง 39 of the Uniform Unclaimed Property Act (1981 Act).
